page.title: 09VILLAGE ACTIVITIES
page.content:
These are the village activities which came from the June issue of the parish magazine 'Village Life.' {Thursday 27th June/}Women's fellowship outing. {Sunday 30th June /}Bishop of Gloucester's visit. {Saturday 6th July /}Sponsored cycle ride. {Saturday 13th July /}VE/VJ Day"Get together".Bibury Village Hall. {Monday 26th August /}combined cricket/ football clubs' fete.
{JUNE SERVICES AT THE CHURCH
2nd Barnsley 9.30am Holy communion. 9th Barnsley 9.30am Holy communion. 16th Barnsley 11.00am morning prayer ( Rev. Douglas Argyle.)
